name: Eastern Market Murder
description:
Step back in time to solve a true crime!

Delve into a world of fortune tellers and phrenologists in this twisted true tale of murder and madness. Blood red radishes, a business rivalry, whispers of false friends. When everything is not as it seems, will you foresee how it ends?

With options to play at home, or where the events actually occured, you’ll explore crime scenes, question witnesses and examine evidence to outsmart the killer and reclaim justice for the victim's family.

FEATURES:
* Explore actual locations and meet characters in augmented reality.
* Play offsite anywhere, anytime with no walking required (1 hour play time).
* Play locally in Melbourne, Australia with a 2.5km self-guided exploration of heritage sites and laneways (1.5 hours play-time).
* Fully-voice acted dialogue, with original music by Sianna Lee - best played with headphones.
* Historically accurate true crime from 1899 - scenes and characters faithfully re-created from photographs, witness testimonies and newspaper articles.

REQUIREMENTS:
* Device must be compatible with Google ARCore which requires an ARKit compatible device running iOS 11.0 or later.
* Location/GPS must be switched on for on-site version (if played in Melbourne).
* Camera permissions must be given to enable augmented reality functionality.
* Continued use of GPS running in the background can reduce battery life.
